price: 36 mais n’y avons trouvé qu’une seule famille soumise au Seigneur[1325].
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
